about_the_game:
Before the Blood is an intense 3rd-person urban beat-em-up in which you punch, kick and knock out rival gang members on you journey to uncover the truth at Hilden Green - the place where Micky's brother, Dean, allegedly took his own life.

With easy-to-perform yet difficult-to-master combo moves, you play as Keli; a tough-talking, hard-as-nails youth who sets in motion a dark, sinister narrative as she helps her friend Micky discover what really happened around his brother's supposed suicide. Fight on your own in one-player or in local co-op with a friend as you take on the networks of runners, dealers and boss's on your way to the tower block where Dean died.

Respect is king: With each fight you learn more moves, and the more you know the more Respect points you'll earn, indicating to other gangs how powerful you are - but remember, your real enemy will go to extreme lengths to protect the truth.

The phone: Keli can use an app on her phone to access the darkweb to see who is packing and selling, who to fight and most importantly who not to fight. Local co-op: Get blood on your knuckles and get to Hilden Green on your own or let one of your crew play as Micky to help fight your way through the different boroughs.

Multiple weapons: Loads of weapons for you to choose from to progress through the hard hitting narrative.
